title: What a safety expert thinks journalists should know about “less than lethal” rounds and chemical irritants used by ICE
description: On January 18, a photograph of a pair of safety goggles in a hardware store floated across my Instagram timeline. “#JOURNALISTS covering #iceprotest in #Minneapolis: Less lethal projectiles move 400-600 feet per second. Z87.1 glasses no longer provide the protection required,” read the caption. The post came from Crisis Ready Media and was shared by...
